question.questionText: Katie got a guitar for her birthday. She experimented with the strings and found she could change their sounds. One way Katie could change the sound of a string was to tighten it. Describe how the sound was different when the string was tightened.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: When the string was tighter, the pitch was higher.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: If you get it right it will not have much Frequency.
If the strings were tightened it would make a high sound.
It was soft then it got louder.
